# sendsActionOnArrowKeys

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether pressing an arrow key causes an action message to be sent.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sendsActionOnArrowKeys: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], pressing an arrow key scrolls the browser. When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], it also sends the action message specified by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/action].

## Managing Actions

- **doubleAction**: The browser’s double-click action method.
- **sendAction()**: Sends the action message to the target.
